title: PBE does not arrive
body: More than a month ago I am waiting , they could tell me how is the maximum that has to wait{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Thank you that was all , you answered all of my questions
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I waited a few years to get mine.  So don't get your hopes up.

Every month we take a certain amount of new players into the PBE.  Applying to become part of the PBE doesn't mean that you will automatically be selected!  It is possible you'll be accepted next month, or maybe not for many months yet.  There is no way to know for sure :(

I hope this clarifies things somewhat!  Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
